LOCAL_MIN_RC_TESTS
  FORTRAN90 version.
  Test LOCAL_MIN_RC, the reverse communication version of 
  the Brent routine which seeks a local minimizer of a function F(X)
  in an interval [A,B].
 
  g_01(x) = ( x - 2 ) * ( x - 2 ) + 1
